table_description: Contains data for the fastest laps recorded in races from 1950-2020, including driver and team details.

table_columns.name: name
table_columns.description: Name of the driver who set the fastest lap.

table_columns.name: time
table_columns.description: The fastest lap time, in the format 'M:SS.mmm'.

table_columns.name: lap
table_columns.description: The lap number on which the fastest lap was set.

table_columns.name: speed
table_columns.description: The average speed during the fastest lap in km/h.

table_rules: Lap times are stored as text in the format 'M:SS.mmm', use appropriate string functions for comparison.
Track configurations have changed over time, so direct lap time comparisons for the same venue across years may not be valid.
Speed is measured in km/h and should be treated as a float for calculations.
